ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:0.5_0: 22. The training rule on bathing robes
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.2_0: At that time the Buddha had allowed bathing robes for the nuns.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.4_0: Knowing this, the nuns from the group of six wore bathing robes of inappropriate size.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.5_0: and then walked back in front of them.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.7_0: “How can the nuns from the group of six wear such bathing robes?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns from the group of six do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.11_0: “... How can the nuns from the group of six wear such bathing robes?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun is having a bathing robe made, it should be made the right size.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.14.1_1: This is the right size: four standard handspans long and one-and-a-half wide.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.14.1_2: there are two standard handspans long and wide.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.14.1_3: If it exceeds that, it is to be cut down, and she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.4_0: making it herself or having someone else make it, it should be made the right size.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.5_0: This is the right size: two standard handspans long and one-and-a-half wide.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.6_0: If she makes one or has one made that exceeds that, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.7_0: When she obtains it, it is to be cut down, and she is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.8.1_0: If she finishes what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.9_0: If she has others finish what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.10_0: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.11_0: If she has others finish what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.12_0: If she makes one or has one made for the benefit of someone else, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.13_0: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.2.2_0: if she makes it the right size;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.2.3_0: if she makes it less than the right size;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.2.4_0: if she obtains one made by someone else that exceeds the right size and she cuts it down before using it;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.2.5_0: if she makes a canopy, a floor cover, a cloth screen, a mattress, or a pillow;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.2.7_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.2.8_0: The second rule, the second training rule on fire, is finished.
